subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In one of the changes sparked by the Tim Donaghy scandal, NBA.com this season began posting the names of officials by 9 a.m. Eastern on the day of the game.
snippet: In one of the changes sparked by the Tim Donaghy scandal, NBA.com this season began posting the names of officials by 9 a.m. Eastern on the day of the game.
